name: AddMiroProjectMember
description:
Add a user to an Enterprise Miro project.

Use this tool to add a Miro user to a project under the Enterprise plan. Requires 'projects:write' scope and Company Admin role.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs. Used to identify the specific team for project member addition.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Miro project to which a user will be added.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project to which you want to add a user.

parameters.name: user_email_id
parameters.description: The email address of the user to be added as a project member.

parameters.name: project_member_role
parameters.description: Role of the user to be assigned in the Miro project. Possible values: owner, editor, viewer, commentator, coowner.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to which you want to add a user.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project to which you want to add a user.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
